dialogues.content: So... The 'Player' can speak after all...

choices.buttonText: You mean, you never hear me speak?
Well yeah, also, why do you look like a chick?

dialogues.content: Not once, you've always been tight-lipped... I was convinced you're just a puppet used by some higher beings...

choices.buttonText: Nah, I just like being silent

dialogues.content: Because I'm special, you caught me off guard, we're not even supposed to meet

choices.buttonText: Ooh, that's cool~ Glad to know that cute creepers actually exist

dialogues.content: Regardless, I'm glad we can speak peacefully. How about this, I will be on my way, no funny business... Maybe we'll meet again~
